name: Lyricsreloaded
tagline: A new aproach to MusicBee's lyrics plugin
body:
### Welcome to the new Lyrics plugin for MusicBee.
It uses a new approuch to loading lyrics warom various sources.
Instead of hardcoding the supported pages in code, this plugin loads simple YAML configurations from a folder which contain enough information to allow te plugin to read lyrics from pages.

### Downloads
We don't have any binary releases yet. However if you really want to try it out just clone this repo and open it in Visual Studio 12 or any compatible IDE.

### Authors and Contributors
This plugin is developed by @quickwango and is inspired by the original Lyrics plugin developed by the MusicBee developer.

### Support or Contact
Any issues are feature request for the plugin? Don't hesitate to register on http://bugs.engine.cubeisland.de and create an issue.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
